# delegate

**Instance Property**

The capture view’s delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any AVCaptureViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The capture view disables the start recording button if you don’t provide a delegate object.

## Configuring the Delegate

- **AVCaptureViewDelegate**: The protocol that defines the methods you can implement to respond to capture view events.
